name: Shoot Fly Bird 3D
description:
Shoot Fly Bird 3D is at the high so grab the hunting gun and go for a birds hunt. Get ready for jungle sniper birds shooting Season. In this game there are alot of birds like crappy bird, eagles, ducks, crows.Best waterfowl free bird hunting game for kids with multiple levels and realistic effects and amazing view.
Features
Real simulation of action in Africa Jungle.
Shoot a flying bird with your sniper action.
Flying bird shooting game.
Real animation of jurassic jungle.
Wildlife safari experience.
Jungle dragon and other dinosaur.
